00002         require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . "/../include/tag_support.inc.php");
00003 
00012         class Gate
00013         {
00018                 public $controller;
00019                 
00024                 public $action;
00025                 
00030                 public $params;
00031                 
00037                 public static function by_URI($the_URI)
00038                 {
00039                         $gate = new self();
00040                         
00041                         $parts = explode('?', $the_URI);
00042                         $qs = $parts[1];
00043                         
00044                         $qs_parts = explode('&', $qs);
00045                         foreach ($qs_parts as $qs_part)
00046                         {
00047                                 $qs_part_parts = explode('=', $qs_part);
00048                                 $gate->params[urldecode($qs_part_parts[0])] = 
00049                                         urldecode(@$qs_part_parts[1]);
00050                         }
00051                         
00052                         $gate->controller = ucwords($gate->params['controller']);
00053                         $gate->action = isset($gate->params['action']) ?
00054                                 $gate->params['action'] : 'index';
00055                         
00056                         unset($gate->params['controller']);
00057                         unset($gate->params['action']);
00058                         
00059                         return $gate;
00060                 }
00061                 
00066                 public function __toString()
00067                 {
00068                         $params = $this->params;
00069                         array_walk($params, create_function('&$val, $key',
00070                                 '$val = span("$key", array(\'class\' => \'code-array-key\')) . ' .
00071                                 'span(\' => \', array(\'class\' => \'code-delimiter\')) . ' .
00072                                 'span("\'$val\'", array(\'class\' => \'code-literal\'));'));
00073                         $params = empty($params) ? '' : implode(span(', ', array('class' => 'code-delimiter')), $params);
00074                         return span("{$this->controller}Controller", array('class' => 'code-class')) .
00075                                 span('::', array('class' => 'code-operator')) .
00076                                 span($this->action, array('class' => 'code-method')) .
00077                                 span('(', array('class' => 'code-delimiter')) .
00078                                 span($params, array('class' => 'code-method-params')) .
00079                                 span(')', array('class' => 'code-delimiter'));
00080                 }
00081         }
